noun.description: A native or inhabitant of Melos.

adjective.description: Of or relating to the island of Melos.

origin: Mid 16th century. From ancient Greek Μῆλος (goes to classical Latin Mēlos), the name of the most south-easterly island of the Cyclades in the Aegean + -ian, after ancient Greek Μήλιος, noun and adjective.
